text: Stephen Francis Patrick Aloysius Dunleavy (January 21, 1938 â€“ June 24, 2019) was an Australian-born American journalist. He was born in Sydney. Dunleavy was best known as a columnist for the New York Post from 1976 to 2008. He was a lead reporter on the tabloid television program A Current Affair in the 1980s and 1990s.
